FuncDef: This command clears dynamic IPsec tunnel states.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the name of the IPsec GW up to 32 characters.
Specifies the IP address and port of the remote peer. Values-<ip-address> |	ip-address 	|a.b.c.d, |ipv6-address| 	x:x:x:x:x:x:x:x , ||x:x:x:x:x:x:d.d.d.d, ||			x - [0 to FFFF]H, ||			d - [0 to 255]D.
The port of the remote peer. Values-0 to 65535.
Removes the saved IKE and ESP keys.
